A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: 9.3/10  TLJ isn't perfect (Vice Admiral Holdo's plan for one). And yet\, I don't really care. Our four main characters from the last one are still lovable\, Luke has a new and compelling backstory with Ren\, and there's the casino stuff. Okay\, that wasn't exactly the film's brightest part\, but it seemed like it existed to show newcomer Rose's personality\, how far Finn's come from being a Stormtrooper\, and raise questions about the difference between good and evil. Oh\, and there's the climax on that salt planet that is just beautiful. Overall\, TLJ is risky\, original\, action-packed\, and sometimes surprising. In other words\, it's Star Wars.
